DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether left atrium substrate based ablation plus circumferential is effective in the treatment of persistent and long-standing atrial fibrillation.
DOC.brief_title: Left Atrium Substrate Based Ablation Plus Circumferential Pulmonary Vein Isolation to Treat Chronic Atrial Fibrillation
DOC.criteria: All persistent or permanent AF patients with refractory or intolerant to at least one Class 1 or Class 3 antiarrhythmic medication. 1. Patients with paroxysmal AF (selfterminating episodes lasting < 7 day) 2. Patients who have had a previous AF ablation procedure 3. Pregnancy
